name: Fluid Customizer
author: Cameron Jones

sections.description: Fluid Customizer is a simple plug-and-play plugin which allows you to resize the width of the preview window in the Customizer to whichever size you like. Simply install the plugin, go to your Customizer, then click and drag the right border of the sidebar and watch the magic happen!
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Click Add New from the plugins page in your wordpress site
  2. Search for Fluid Customizer
  3. Click on install

Alternatively from wordpress.org

  1. Download the latest version of Fluid Customizer
  2. Extract the files
  3. Upload the entire fluid-customizer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Why isn’t this in core?

I don’t know, but that’s why this plugin was built

Are there any settings to play with?

Nope, just plug and play!

short_description: Preview your site for a variety of different devices by resizing your Customizer sidebar with a simple click and drag
description: Fluid Customizer is a simple plug-and-play plugin which allows you to resize the width of the preview window in the Customizer to whichever size you like. Simply install the plugin, go to your Customizer, then click and drag the right border of the sidebar and watch the magic happen!
